About Projects Homelab
ServerCommander

Mobile application that helps manage self-hosted homelab.

AndroidKotlinDockerYunoHostMobile
PyBackUpper

PyBackUpper is simple Python application deployed with Docker container. It's main goal is to create daily backups of server, but can be used to backup pretty much anything you like.

PythonDockerLinux
Copilot

Copilot is simple companion script for ServerCommander, but it can be used as an completely separate app and can be added to be a part of other project. Copilot is focused on extracting interesting information from the server such as cpu usage, ram usage, component temperatures, network information and much more.

PythonLinux
Hire A Babysitter

Hire A Babysitter was my project for an engineering thesis. The main goal of this project was to create a platform like pracuj.pl or olx.pl/praca, but exclusive for babysitters and parents in need. The project included features like direct messages, acceptance of announcements, issuing opinions for employees and employers, rate negotiations, filtering and searching for announcements using the ElasticSearch engine.

LaravelPHPWeb
This website

As you might have noticed, the site you're looking at is not just a static website ðŸ‘€. It was created using the popular Jekyll framework, which is used by a lot of really BIG companies. You might have also noticed that the site address is not [nickname].github.io, this is because the site is not hosted using GitHub Pages, which is the fastest way to put up a site created in Jekyll.
